# How to contribute

## GitHub Users

### Bug Reports
If you discover a bug when reusing this code, please make us aware by using GitHub's Issues Tracker (read more here:[GitHub Issues Tracker](https://guides.github.com/features/issues/) ). 

### Bug Fixes
If you find a bug in the code and manage to fix the problem yourself â€“ please share the updated code with us. To propose a fix, please fork a copy of the SmokingDefinition repository, modify the code and issue a pull request.
